$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/history.text:
Full change log:  [[https://kookma.github.io/TW-Shiraz/#ChangeLog]]

* ''2.7.1'' -- 2022.12.17 -- update to Tiddlywiki 5.2.4, few bug fixes
* ''2.6.9'' -- 2022.10.17 -- improved Node Explorer, and task Explorer
* ''2.6.1'' -- 2022.09.27 -- new subplug Formatter, better task manager
* ''2.5.0'' -- 2022.08.02 -- new data block, updated to Tiddlywiki 5.2.3
* ''2.4.4'' -- 2021.09.19 -- added css class for tbl-expand customization
* ''2.4.2'' -- 2021.09.10 -- quick table with bunch of column formatting
* ''2.3.3'' -- 2021.05.20 -- small bug fixes in switch palette
* ''2.3.1'' -- 2021.05.19 -- tbl-linktype template to be used for generating node-explorer
* ''2.3.0'' -- 2021.05.10 -- switch palette for dim/dark and light palette selection
* ''2.2.2'' -- 2021.04.22 -- several issues fixed for pagination, notebook and image classes
* ''2.2.0'' -- 2021.02.26 -- updated to TW 5.1.23 and pagination added to dynamic tables
* ''2.1.1'' -- 2020.03.25 -- slider macro with initial status
* ''2.1.0'' -- 2020.03.23 -- stable release on TW-5.1.22pre
* ''1.0.0'' -- 2018.10.05 -- first public release

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/alerts.text:
\define alert(type:primary src width:100% class)
$src$
\end \define alert-leftbar(type:primary src width:100% class)
$src$
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/badge.text: \define badge(type:primary src)$src$ \define badge-pill(type:primary src)$src$

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/card.text:
\define card(header:Empty title:Empty subtitle:Empty text:Empty footer:Empty width:100% class)
<$reveal tag=div type=nomatch text=<<__header__>>default=Empty>
$header$
<$reveal tag=div type=nomatch text=<<__title__>>default=Empty>
$title$
<$reveal tag=div type=nomatch text=<<__subtitle__>>default=Empty>
$subtitle$
<$reveal tag=div type=nomatch text=<<__text__>>default=Empty>
<<__text__>>
<$reveal tag=div type=nomatch text=<<__footer__>>default=Empty>
$footer$
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtable.text:
\define nomenclature(id:nomenclature)<<table-csv id:"$id$"format:"katex-inline transclude pu"class:table-borderless header:no>>
\define mathbox(id format delimiter:,)<<table-csv id:"$id$"format:"transclude katex $format$"class:"table-borderless table-mathbox"header:no delimiter:"""$delimiter$""">>

\define date()<$view field=title tiddler={{{[<entry>splitregexp[\D+]!is[blank]join[]]}}}format=date template=YYYY-0MM-0DD/>
\define shortdate()<$view field=title tiddler={{{[<entry>splitregexp[\D+]!is[blank]join[]]}}}template="mmm DDth, YYYY"format=date/>
\define longdate()<$view field=title tiddler={{{[<entry>splitregexp[\D+]!is[blank]join[]]}}}template="DDD, MMM 0DD, YYYY"format=date/>

\define katex()<span class=falign><$latex text=<<entry>>displayMode>
\define katex-inline()<$latex text=<<entry>>displayMode=false>
\define pu()<$latex text={{{[<entry>addprefix[\pu{]addsuffix[}]]}}}displayMode=false>
\define equation()<$latex text={{{[<entry>addprefix[\begin{equation}]addsuffix[\end{equation}]]}}}displayMode>

\define checkbox()
<$list filter="[<entry>trim[]match[x]]"variable=ignore><input type=checkbox checked disabled></$list>
<!---->
<$list filter="[<entry>trim[]match[-]]"variable=ignore><input type=checkbox disabled>
\end
\define todo-action(param)
<$let lbr="
">
  <$vars in={{{[<row>addsuffix<lbr>]}}}out={{{[<row>splitregexp<delimiter>rest[]join[,]addprefix[$param$,]addsuffix<lbr>]}}}>
    <$action-setfield $tiddler=<<src>>text={{{[<src>get[text]search-replace:g:<in>,<out>]}}}/>
  </$vars>
</$let>	
\end
\define todo()
<$list filter="[<entry>trim[]match[-]]"variable=ignore>
<$button actions=<<todo-action x>>class=tc-btn-invisible><input type=checkbox></$button>
</$list>
<!---->
<$list filter="[<entry>trim[]match[x]]"variable=ignore>
<$button actions=<<todo-action ->>class=tc-btn-invisible><input type=checkbox checked></$button>
</$list>

\end

\define table-csv(tiddler delimiter:, sortType:alphanumeric format caption class header:yes stateTiddler id dclass:dblock)
\whitespace trim
\import $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtables/table-csv-utility
\import [all[tiddlers+shadows]prefix[$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/csvtables/formats]]
<$vars src={{{[<__tiddler__>is[tiddler]then<__tiddler__>else{!!title}]}}}stateTiddler={{{[<__stateTiddler__>!is[blank]then<__stateTiddler__>else[01]]}}}><$vars sortCol={{{[<tempTableSort>getindex[sortIndex]]}}}sortNegate={{{[<tempTableSort>getindex[negate]]}}}delimiter={{{[<__delimiter__>match[\t]then[°≡°]else<__delimiter__>]}}}dataBlockStartDelimiter={{{[<__id__>is[blank]then[@@.$dclass$]]~[[@.$dclass$.]addsuffix<__id__>]}}}dataBlockEndDelimiter=@@>

<$let dblock0={{{[<src>get[text]splitregexp<dataBlockStartDelimiter>butfirst[1]]}}}dblock1={{{[<dblock0>splitregexp<dataBlockEndDelimiter>butlast[1]]}}}dblock={{{[<delimiter>!match[°≡°]then<dblock1>]:else[<dblock1>search-replace:g:regexp[\t],[°≡°]]}}}>

<table class="$class$"><$list filter="[<__caption__>!is[blank]]"variable=ignorw><caption>$caption$</caption></$list><$list filter="[<__header__>match[yes]then[1]else[0]]"variable=header_row><$let allRows="[<dblock>splitregexp[\n]!is[blank]]"><$list filter="[subfilter<allRows>first<header_row>]"variable=row><tr><$list filter="[<row>splitregexp<delimiter>!is[blank]trim[]]"variable=currentColumn><<column-header-template>></$list></tr></$list><$let sortPos={{{[subfilter<allRows>first<header_row>splitregexp<delimiter>!is[blank]trim[]allbefore:include<sortCol>count[]]}}}sortType={{{[enlist:raw<__sortType__>nth<sortPos>else[alphanumeric]]}}}><$list filter=<<mainFilter>>variable=row><tr><$list filter="[<row>splitregexp<delimiter>!is[blank]trim[]]"variable=entry counter=pos><td><$macrocall $name={{{[enlist:raw<__format__>nth<pos>else[text]]}}}/>
\end

\define mainFilter()[subfilterbutfirst] :sort:$(sortType)$:$(sortNegate)$[split!is[blank]trim[]nth] \define tempTableSort()$:/state/tablecsv/$(currentTiddler)$/$(stateTiddler)$ \define column-header-template() <$reveal type=nomatch stateTitle=<>stateIndex=sortIndex text=<>tag=th> <$button setTitle=<>setTo=<>class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"setIndex=sortIndex> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<>$index=hasnegate $value=false/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<>$value=""$index=negate/> <$text text=<>/> <$reveal type=match stateTitle=<>stateIndex=sortIndex text=<>tag=th> <$list filter="[getindex[hasnegate]match[false]]"variable=ignore> <$button setTitle=<>setIndex=hasnegate class="tbl-sort-svg tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"setTo> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<>$index=negate $value=reverse/> <$text text=<>/> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$list filter="[getindex[hasnegate]match[true]]"variable=ignore> <$button setTitle=<>setIndex=hasnegate class="tbl-sort-svg tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"setTo=false> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<>$value=""$index=negate/> <$text text=<>/> {{$:/core/images/up-arrow}} \end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dbadge.text:
\define dbadge(subject status type:primary)
$subject$$status$

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/details.text:
\define details(label src:source status labelClass srcClass) <$let source={{{[<__src__>get[text]else<__src__>]}}}>
<$let tv-wikilinks=no> $label$
<$transclude tiddler=<>field=title mode=block/>
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/dtables/.text:
\define confirm-delete()
<$list filter="[subfilter<inputFilter>nth[]]"variable=ignore>
<$reveal class=tbl-delete-confirm type=match stateTitle="$:/temp/tables/delete-all"stateField=text text=<<currentTable>>tag=tr>
<th colspan=<<ncols>>>
<$list filter="[[$:/temp/tables/delete-all]get[confirm]match[yes]]"emptyMessage=<<ask-for-delete>>variable=ignore>
  <<perform-delete>>
</$list>
</th>
</$reveal>

\end
\define ask-for-delete()
<$set filter="[subfilter<inputFilter>count[]]"name=ntids>
   Delete all <<ntids>> records?
	<$button class=tc-btn-invisible>
     <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/tables/delete-all"$field=confirm $value=yes/>
      {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} yes
    </$button> or 
    <$button class=tc-btn-invisible>
      <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/temp/tables/delete-all"/>
      {{$:/core/images/close-button}} no
    </$button>
</$set>				
\end
\define perform-delete()
   Warning! this action cannot be undone!
	<$button class=tc-btn-invisible>
     <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/temp/tables/delete-all"/>
     <$list filter=<<inputFilter>>variable=currentRecord>
        <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<<currentRecord>>/>
     </$list>
		 {{$:/core/images/delete-button}}  delete
    </$button> or 
    <$button class=tc-btn-invisible>
      <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/temp/tables/delete-all"/>
			{{$:/core/images/close-button}} cancel 
    
\end

\define columnFilter()$(columns)$ tbl-delete
\define tempTable()$:/state/dynamictables/$(currentTable)$
\define tempTableSort()$(tempTable)$/sortby
\define tempTagPopup()$(tempTable)$/$(currentRecord)$/$(currentTiddler)$
\define tempTableExpand()$(tempTable)$/expand
\define tempPathExpand()$(tempTableExpand)$##$(currentRecord)$
\define tempTableEdit()$(tempTable)$/edit-view-status
\define keepstate()$:/keepstate/dynamictables/$(currentTable)$
\define tempTableFooter()$(keepstate)$/footer
\define tempTableStyle()$(keepstate)$/style
\define tempWarningMsg()$(keepstate)$/warning
\define pageStateTiddler()$(keepstate)$/page-number
\define entryPerPageStateTiddler()$(keepstate)$/entry-per-page

\define average(pn:0)<$text text={{{[subfilter<inputFilter>$(getFieldOrIndex)$<currentColumn>average[]]}}}/>
\define median(pn:0)<$text text={{{[subfilter<inputFilter>$(getFieldOrIndex)$<currentColumn>median[]]}}}/>
\define count()<$text text={{{[subfilter<inputFilter>$(getFieldOrIndex)$<currentColumn>count[]]}}}/>
\define sum()<$text text={{{[subfilter<inputFilter>$(getFieldOrIndex)$<currentColumn>sum[]]}}}/>
\define product()<$text text={{{[subfilter<inputFilter>$(getFieldOrIndex)$<currentColumn>product[]]}}}/>
\define minall()<$text text={{{[subfilter<inputFilter>$(getFieldOrIndex)$<currentColumn>minall[]]}}}/>
\define maxall()<$text text={{{[subfilter<inputFilter>$(getFieldOrIndex)$<currentColumn>maxall[]]}}}/>

\define prev-button() <$list filter="[compare:number:lt[2]then[yes]else[no]]"variable=state> <$button disabled=<>class="shiraz-dtable-page-prev tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/chevron-left}} Prev <$action-listops $tiddler=<>$subfilter="+[subtract[1]] ~[[1]]"$field=text/> \end \define next-button() <$list filter="[compare:number:gteqthen[yes]else[no]]"variable=state> <$button disabled=<>class="shiraz-dtable-page-next tc-btn-invisible"> Next {{$:/core/images/chevron-right}} <$action-listops $tiddler=<>$subfilter="+[add[1]] ~[[2]]"$field=text/> \end \define limit-entries() <$select tiddler=<>actions='<$action-setfield $tiddler=<>text=1/>'default=25> <$list filter='5 10 15 20 25 30 40 50'variable=num> \end

\define showCell()
  <$list filter="[<fieldOrIndex>]-index">
    <$transclude tiddler=<<currentRecord>>field=<<currentColumn>>mode=inline/>
  </$list>
  <$list filter="[<fieldOrIndex>]-field">
    <$transclude tiddler=<<currentRecord>>index=<<currentColumn>>mode=inline/>
  
\end
\define editCell()
  <$list filter="[<fieldOrIndex>]-index">
    <$edit-text tiddler=<<currentRecord>>field=<<currentColumn>>tag=input class=shiraz-dtable-textbox/>
  </$list>
  <$list filter="[<fieldOrIndex>]-field">
    <$edit-text tiddler=<<currentRecord>>index=<<currentColumn>>tag=input class=shiraz-dtable-textbox/>
  
\end
\define showCell_Locked()
 <span style=font-style:oblique;><<showCell>>
\end

\define table-dynamic(filter fields indexes sortOp:sort caption class footerRows:0 stateTiddler editButton:yes pagination:no emptyMessage:[[filter input is empty]]) \import [[$:/tags/Table/Macro]tagging[]] <$vars inputFilter="[subfilter<__filter__>!has[draft.of]]"sortType=<<__sortOp__>>pagination=<<__pagination__>>> <$set value=<<__stateTiddler__>>emptyValue={{!!title}}name=currentTable> <$let fieldOrIndex={{{[<__fields__>!is[blank]then[field]else[index]]}}}> <> <$set filter="[]-index"value=<<__fields__>>emptyValue=<<__indexes__>>name=columns> <$list filter="[subfilternth[]]"emptyMessage=<<__emptyMessage__>>variable=ignore> <$set name=sortneg tiddler=<>index=negate> <$set filter="[getindex[mode]match[edit]]"value={{{[subfiltercount[]]}}}emptyValue={{{[subfiltercount[]subtract[1]]}}}name=ncols>
>style=caption-side:top> <> <$list filter=<>variable=currentColumn> <$set filter="[[$:/tags/Table/HeaderTemplate]tagging[]contains:tbl-column-listnth[]get[title]]"value=<>emptyValue="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/header/default"name=headerLookup> <$transclude tiddler=<>field=text mode=inline/> <$reveal type=gt default=<<__footerRows__>>text=0 tag=tfoot class=shiraz-dtable-footer> <$list filter="[range[1,$footerRows$]addprefix[footer-]]"variable=footerRow> <$list filter=<>variable=currentColumn> <$set filter="[[$:/tags/Table/FooterTemplate]tagging[]contains:tbl-column-listnth[]get[title]]"value=<>emptyValue="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/footer/default"name=footerLookup> <$transclude tiddler=<>field=text mode=inline/> <$let tableBody={{{[]-index +[then[display_body_fields]else[display_body_indexes]]}}}> <$vars total-entries={{{[subfiltercount[]]}}}page-number={{{[get[text]]~1}}}entries-per-page={{{[get[text]]~25}}}> <$vars low={{{[subtract[1]multiply]}}}high={{{[multiply]}}}> <$macrocall $name=<>/> <$reveal type=match default=<>text=yes tag=tr class=shiraz-dtable-page-footer>
<$list filter="[<__editButton__>match[yes]]"variable=ignore> <> $caption$
>style=font-weight:bold;background-color:transparent;>Numerical summary
>> <> Displaying <$text text={{{[add[1]]}}}/> through <$text text={{{[compare:number:ltthenelse]}}}/> of <> Results | <> <>
\end

\define tableFilter_fields()$(inputFilter)$+[$(sortneg)$$(sortType)${$(tempTableSort)$##sortIndex}]
\define tableFilter_indexes()[enlist<items>]+[$(sortneg)$$(sortType)$[]]
\define getitems()
<$set name=Index tiddler=<<tempTableSort>>index=sortIndex>
<$list filter="[subfilter<inputFilter>!is[draft]]">
<$text text=[[/>{{{[{!!title}getindex<Index>addsuffix[°≡°]]}}}<<currentTiddler>><$text text=]]/>
</$list>

\end
\define display_one_record()
<$wikify name=rowStyle text="<$transclude tiddler=<<tempTableStyle>>index=<<currentRecord>>/>"mode=inline>
<tr style=<<rowStyle>>>
<$list filter=<<columnFilter>>variable=currentColumn>
<$set filter="[[$:/tags/Table/BodyTemplate]tagging[]contains:tbl-column-list<currentColumn>nth[]get[title]]"value=<<bodyLookup>>emptyValue="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/body/default"name=bodyLookup>
<$transclude tiddler=<<bodyLookup>>field=text mode=inline/>
</$set>
</$list>
</tr>
<!---->
<$reveal type=match state=<<tempPathExpand>>text=show tag=tr>
<<display-expanded-record>>
</$reveal>

\end
\define display_body_fields()
<$set filter="[<pagination>match[yes]]"value="[subfilter<tableFilter_fields>first<high>] -[subfilter<tableFilter_fields>first<low>]"emptyValue="[subfilter<tableFilter_fields>]"name=finalFilter>
<$list filter="[subfilter<finalFilter>]"variable=currentRecord>
<<display_one_record>>
</$list>

\end
\define display_body_indexes()
<$wikify text=<<getitems>>name=items> 
<$set filter="[<pagination>match[yes]]"value="[subfilter<tableFilter_indexes>first<high>] -[subfilter<tableFilter_indexes>first<low>]"emptyValue="[subfilter<tableFilter_indexes>]"name=finalFilter>
<$list filter="[subfilter<finalFilter>]"variable=currentItem>
<$list filter="[<currentItem>split[°≡°]last[]]"variable=currentRecord>
 <<display_one_record>>
</$list>
</$list>
</$set>

\end

\define display-expanded-record()
<td colspan=<<ncols>>class=shiraz-dtable-expanded-record>
<$tiddler tiddler=<<currentRecord>>>

<$list filter="[<tempTableEdit>getindex[mode]match[edit]]"emptyMessage="{{||$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/body}}"variable=ignore>
<$reveal type=nomatch state="$:/config/shiraz/dynamictables/editor-type"text=main-editor tag=div>
<$edit-text class=tbl-inpt-edit tiddler=<<currentRecord>>field=text tag=textarea/>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type=match state="$:/config/shiraz/dynamictables/editor-type"text=main-editor tag=div class=shiraz-dtable-maineditor>
{{||$:/core/ui/EditTemplate/body}}
</$reveal>
</$list>

</$tiddler>

\end

\define toggle-edit-view()
<$reveal type=nomatch stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>>stateIndex=mode text=edit>
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"setTitle=<<tempTableEdit>>setIndex=mode setTo=edit>{{$:/core/images/edit-button}}</$button>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type=match stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>>stateIndex=mode text=edit>
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"setTitle=<<tempTableEdit>>setIndex=mode setTo=view>{{$:/core/images/done-button}}</$button>

\end

\define show_tiddler_types()
List tiddlers with wrong type
<$list filter="[subfilter]"> <$list filter="[{!!title}get[type]match[application/x-tiddler-dictionary]][{!!title}get[type]match[application/json]]"emptyMessage="
<$link/>
<$view field=type/>"variable=ignore>
\end \define show_warning_message() Dynamic editable table from ''indexes'' expects all input tiddlers are of dataTiddler (json or dictionary) types. Using tiddlers of non //json// or //x-tiddler-dictionary// types as input can unintentionally overwrite the data in the text field of those tiddlers.

Check the tiddler types to find which tiddlers are not of dataTiddler types!
<> \end \define check_tiddlers_type_for_table_from_indexes(isEditable) <$list filter="[]-field"variable=ignore> <$list filter="[<__isEditable__>match[yes]]"variable=ignore> <$list filter="[is[missing]]"variable=ignore> <$list filter="[subfiltereach[type]get[type]]-application/x-tiddler-dictionary -application/json"variable=ignore>
Danger: Editable dynamic table from idexes with mixed types of tiddlers!   <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"tooltip="Dismiss alert and continue with the current selection!"style=fill:white;>{{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$action-setfield $tiddler=<>text=dissmiss/>
<>
\end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-ba.text: \define image-basic(img width:30% align:none caption tooltip alt) \end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-ca.text:
\define image-card(img width:30% align:none title:Empty text:Empty footer:Empty pos:top alt) \import $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-card-utility <$reveal tag=div type=match text=<<__pos__>>default=top> <$macrocall img=<<__img__>>title=<<__title__>>text=<<__text__>>footer=<<__footer__>>width=<<__width__>>align=<<__align__>>alt=<<__alt__>>$name=image-card-top/> <$reveal tag=div type=nomatch text=<<__pos__>>default=top> <$macrocall img=<<__img__>>title=<<__title__>>text=<<__text__>>footer=<<__footer__>>width=<<__width__>>align=<<__align__>>alt=<<__alt__>>$name=image-card-bottom/> \end \define image-card-top(img width:30% align:none title:Empty text:Empty footer:Empty alt)
<$image source=<<__img__>>alt=<<__alt__>>class=card-img-top/>
<$reveal tag=div type=nomatch text=<<__title__>>default=Empty>
$title$
<$reveal tag=div type=nomatch text=<<__text__>>default=Empty>
$text$
<$reveal tag=div type=nomatch text=<<__footer__>>default=Empty>

$footer$

\end \define image-card-bottom(img width:30% align:none title:Empty text:Empty footer:Empty alt)
<$reveal tag=div type=nomatch text=<<__title__>>default=Empty>
$title$
<$reveal tag=div type=nomatch text=<<__text__>>default=Empty>
$text$
<$reveal tag=div type=nomatch text=<<__footer__>>default=Empty>

$footer$

<$image source=<<__img__>>alt=<<__alt__>>class=card-img-bottom/> \end

\define image-card-top(img width:30% align:none title:Empty text:Empty footer:Empty alt)
<$image source=<<__img__>>alt=<<__alt__>>class=card-img-top/>
<$reveal tag=div type=nomatch text=<<__title__>>default=Empty>
$title$
<$reveal tag=div type=nomatch text=<<__text__>>default=Empty>
$text$
<$reveal tag=div type=nomatch text=<<__footer__>>default=Empty>

$footer$

\end \define image-card-bottom(img width:30% align:none title:Empty text:Empty footer:Empty alt)
<$reveal tag=div type=nomatch text=<<__title__>>default=Empty>
$title$
<$reveal tag=div type=nomatch text=<<__text__>>default=Empty>
$text$
<$reveal tag=div type=nomatch text=<<__footer__>>default=Empty>

$footer$

<$image source=<<__img__>>alt=<<__alt__>>class=card-img-bottom/> \end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-ov.text:
\define image-overlay(img width:30% align:none caption title text fadein:left alt) \import $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/image-overlay-utility

$caption$

<$image source=<<__img__>>alt=<<__alt__>>class=image-overlay-content-image/> <$set filter="$fadein$ +[splitbefore[ ]]+[addprefix[image-overlay-fadeIn-]]"name=fdcls>
>>

$title$

$text$

\end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/list-sea.author: Jeremy Ruston
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/list-sea.description: creates few paragraphs of dumy text
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/list-sea.text:
\define list-search(filter:[!is[system]] search:'search:title'template:'$:/core/ui/ListItemTemplate'class:my-3 stateTiddler placeholder:keywords) <$set filter='[[$:/temp/list-search/]addsuffix<__stateTiddler__>addsuffix]'name=state>
>> <$keyboard actions='<$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/>'key=escape> <$edit-text tiddler=<>type=search tag=input default=''placeholder="$placeholder$"class=w-100/>
<$reveal stateTitle=<>stateField=text type=match text=''class=<<__class__>>tag=div> <$list filter=<<__filter__>>template=<<__template__>>/> <$reveal stateTitle=<>stateField=text type=nomatch text=''class=<<__class__>>tag=div> <$let term={{{[get[text]]}}}sub={{{[[[]][<__search__>]"]":and[join[]]}}}> <$list filter='[subfilter<__filter__>subfilter]'template=<<__template__>>/> \end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/slider.text:
\define slider(label src labelClass srcClass status:closed) <$let revealState="""$:/state/shiraz/slider-macro/$(currentTiddler)$/$label$"""source={{{[<__src__>get[text]else<__src__>]}}}>

<$reveal type=nomatch state=<>default="$status$"text=open> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"set=<>setTo=open> {{||$:/core/images/right-arrow}} <$reveal type=match state=<>default="$status$"text=open> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"set=<>setTo=closed> {{||$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$let tv-wikilinks=no>$label$

<$reveal type=match state=<>text=open default="$status$"class="$srcClass$"tag=div> <$transclude tiddler=<>field=title mode=block/> \end

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/macros/text-uti.text: \define tc(src color:red)$src$ \define bc(src color:yellow)$src$ \define mono(src class)$src$ \define transform(case src class)$src$ \define hl(src color:yellow)$src$ \define hls(src color:yellow)$src$ \define hlp(src color:yellow)$src$

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/readme.text:
; Shiraz
Shiraz is a small framework of stylesheets, templates and macros to create stylish contents in Tiddlywiki.  Shiraz has customized elements like alerts, cards, panels, images, static tables, dynamic tables, quick table, badges, texts, etc. Shiraz uses some modified CSS classes from [[Bootstrap|https://getbootstrap.com/]] 4.3.1.

;Code and demo
For learning plugin features, syntax, tutorial and examples see the plugin demo and code pages

* Demo: https://kookma.github.io/TW-Shiraz/
* Code: https://github.com/kookma/TW-Shiraz

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/bglowton.list: mistyrose lemonchiffon lavenderblush lavender honeydew lightcyan aliceblue cornsilk gainsboro bisque snow

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/bs/card.text: .card{position:relative;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;-ms-flex-direction:column;flex-direction:column;min-width:0;word-wrap:break-word;background-color:#fff;background-clip:border-box;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.125);border-radius:.25rem}.card>hr{margin-right:0;margin-left:0}.card>.list-group:first-child .list-group-item:first-child{border-top-left-radius:.25rem;border-top-right-radius:.25rem}.card>.list-group:last-child .list-group-item:last-child{border-bottom-right-radius:.25rem;border-bottom-left-radius:.25rem}.card-body{-ms-flex:1 1 auto;flex:1 1 auto;padding:1.25rem}.card-title{margin-bottom:.75rem}.card-subtitle{margin-top:-0.375rem;margin-bottom:0}.card-text:last-child{margin-bottom:0}.card-link:hover{text-decoration:none}.card-link+.card-link{margin-left:1.25rem}.card-header{padding:.75rem 1.25rem;margin-bottom:0;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0.03);border-bottom:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.125)}.card-header:first-child{border-radius:calc(0.25rem - 1px) calc(0.25rem - 1px) 0 0}.card-header+.list-group .list-group-item:first-child{border-top:0}.card-footer{padding:.75rem 1.25rem;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0.03);border-top:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.125)}.card-footer:last-child{border-radius:0 0 calc(0.25rem - 1px) calc(0.25rem - 1px)}.card-header-tabs{margin-right:-0.625rem;margin-bottom:-0.75rem;margin-left:-0.625rem;border-bottom:0}.card-header-pills{margin-right:-0.625rem;margin-left:-0.625rem}.card-img-overlay{position:absolute;top:0;right:0;bottom:0;left:0;padding:1.25rem}.card-img{width:100%;border-radius:calc(0.25rem - 1px)}.card-img-top{width:100%;border-top-left-radius:calc(0.25rem - 1px);border-top-right-radius:calc(0.25rem - 1px)}.card-img-bottom{width:100%;border-bottom-right-radius:calc(0.25rem - 1px);border-bottom-left-radius:calc(0.25rem - 1px)}

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/dynamic-.text: .shiraz-dtable-maineditor .tc-editor-toolbar button svg{height:.9em;width:.9em}.shiraz-dtable-maineditor .tc-editor-toolbar button .katex{font-size:.9em;line-height:1em}.shiraz-dtable-textbox{width:100%;padding-left:5px;border:0}.shiraz-dtable-textbox:focus{outline:0;border:1px solid #5778d8;background:transparent}.tbl-inpt-edit{width:100%;background-color:transparent;border:0;color:#000}button.tbl-sort-svg>svg{text-shadow:none;fill:#000;height:10px;padding:0 0 2px 0}th .tc-tiddlylink,th a{text-shadow:none;margin:0;padding:0;color:#000;font-weight:bold}table thead .tbl-delete-confirm>th{color:white;background-color:#f03;padding:8px;margin:0;text-align:center;font-weight:normal}table thead .tbl-delete-confirm>th>button{color:white;fill:white}.shiraz-dtable-page-footer td{margin:0;padding:4px 7px 4px 7px}.shiraz-dtable-page-footer select{padding:0;margin:0;border:0}.shiraz-dtable-page-footer{text-align:center}.shiraz-dtable-page-prev{float:left;margin-right:8px}.shiraz-dtable-page-next{float:right;margin-left:8px}.shiraz-dtable-page-footer button svg{height:.7em}.shiraz-dtable-page-footer button{outline:0;line-height:normal}.shiraz-dtable-page-footer button:disabled{display:none}.shiraz-dtable-col-fixedsize{width:5.5rem;white-space:nowrap}.shiraz-dtable-priority{width:6.5rem;white-space:nowrap}.shiraz-dtable-svg{width:28px;max-width:28px}.shiraz-dtable-title{max-width:15rem;overflow:hidden;text-overflow:ellipsis;white-space:nowrap}

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/image-ov.text: .image-overlay-container{width:50%;box-sizing:border-box}@media screen and (max-width:640px){.image-overlay-container{display:block;width:100%}}@media screen and (min-width:900px){.image-overlay-container{width:33.33%}}.image-overlay-container .image-overlay-title{color:#1a1a1a;text-align:center;margin-bottom:10px}.image-overlay-content{position:relative;width:90%;max-width:400px;margin:auto;overflow:hidden}.image-overlay-content .image-overlay-content-overlay{background:rgba(0,0,0,0.7);position:absolute;height:99%;width:100%;left:0;top:0;bottom:0;right:0;opacity:0;-webkit-transition:all .4s ease-in-out 0s;-moz-transition:all .4s ease-in-out 0s;transition:all .4s ease-in-out 0s}.image-overlay-content:hover .image-overlay-content-overlay{opacity:1}.image-overlay-content-image{width:100%}.image-overlay-content-details{position:absolute;text-align:center;padding-left:1em;padding-right:1em;width:100%;top:50%;left:50%;opacity:0;-webkit-transform:translate(-50%,-50%);-moz-transform:translate(-50%,-50%);transform:translate(-50%,-50%);-webkit-transition:all .3s ease-in-out 0s;-moz-transition:all .3s ease-in-out 0s;transition:all .3s ease-in-out 0s}.image-overlay-content:hover .image-overlay-content-details{top:50%;left:50%;opacity:1}.image-overlay-content-details h3{color:#fff;font-weight:500;letter-spacing:.15em;margin-bottom:.5em;text-transform:uppercase}.image-overlay-content-details p{color:#fff;font-size:.8em}.image-overlay-fadeIn-bottom{top:80%}.image-overlay-fadeIn-top{top:20%}.image-overlay-fadeIn-left{left:20%}.image-overlay-fadeIn-right{left:80%}

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/notebook.text: @media print{.notebook .tc-tiddler-body{padding-left:60px;margin-top:25px}.notebook .tc-tiddler-title,.notebook .tc-subtitle,.notebook .tc-tags-wrapper{padding-left:60px}}@media screen{.notebook .tc-tiddler-title,.notebook .tc-subtitle,.notebook .tc-tags-wrapper,.notebook .tc-tiddler-body{padding-left:30px}}@media screen and (max-width:960px){.notebook .tc-tiddler-title,.notebook .tc-subtitle,.notebook .tc-tags-wrapper,.notebook .tc-tiddler-body{padding-left:60px}}.notebook:not([data-tiddler-title^="Draft of"]):before{content:'';position:absolute;top:0;bottom:0;left:0;width:50px;background:radial-gradient(#575450 6px,transparent 7px) repeat-y;background-size:30px 30px;border-right:3px solid #d44147;z-index:1}.notebook .tc-tiddler-body{position:relative;background:linear-gradient(transparent,transparent 1.95em,#91d1d3 1.95em);background-size:2em 2em;min-height:90px}.notebook .tc-tiddler-body{padding-top:20px;font-family:"Handlee",cursive;font-weight:300;line-height:2em;color:#696969}.notebook .tc-tiddler-body pre,.notebook .tc-tiddler-body code,.notebook .tc-tiddler-body pre code{font-family:"Handlee",cursive;font-weight:300}

tr:nth-child(even) td{background-color:#f3f6f6}.table-striped-col tbody tr td:nth-child(odd){background-color:#f3f6f6}.table-borderless,.table-borderless thead td,.table-borderless th,.table-borderless tr,.table-borderless td{border:0}.table-lines thead td,.table-lines th{border-bottom:2px solid #ddd;background-color:unset}.table-lines td{border-bottom:1px solid #ddd;background-color:unset}.table-hover tbody tr:hover{color:#212529;background-color:#e6e6e6}.table-hover-yellow tbody tr:hover{background-color:#ffc}.table-hover-cyan tbody tr:hover{background-color:#e6ffff}.thead-primary thead td,.thead-primary th{background-color:#007bff;color:#fff}.thead-secondary thead td,.thead-secondary thead td,.thead-dark th{background-color:#343a40;color:#fff}.thead-light thead td,.thead-light th{background-color:#f8f9fa;color:#212529}.thead-primary>thead>tr>td svg,.thead-primary>thead>tr>th svg,.thead-secondary>thead>tr>td svg,.thead-secondary>thead>tr>th svg,.thead-success>thead>tr>td svg,.thead-success>thead>tr>th svg,.thead-warning>thead>tr>td svg,.thead-warning>thead>tr>th svg,.thead-danger>thead>tr>td svg,.thead-danger>thead>tr>th svg,.thead-info>thead>tr>td svg,.thead-info>thead>tr>th svg,.thead-dark>thead>tr>td svg,.thead-dark>thead>tr>th svg{fill:#fff;padding:0 0 $:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/body/.text:
\define showCell()
<style>
.dt:not(:disabled):dt(.disabled) {cursor: pointer;}
a.dt.disabled,fieldset:disabled a.dt {pointer-events: none;}
</style>
<$link overrideClass="dt disabled"to="">
<$edit-text tag=input type=color tiddler=<<currentRecord>>field=color/>

\end
\define edit_color()<$edit-text tag=input tiddler=<<currentRecord>>field=<<currentColumn>>type=color/>
<$reveal type=nomatch stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>>stateIndex=mode text=edit tag=td>
<<showCell>>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type=match stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>>stateIndex=mode text=edit tag=td>
<!---->
<$list filter="[<tempTableSort>getindex[sortIndex]match<currentColumn>]"emptyMessage=<<edit_color>>variable=ignore>
 <<showCell_Locked>>
</$list>

<$reveal type=nomatch stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>>stateIndex=mode text=edit tag=td>
<<showCell>>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type=match stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>>stateIndex=mode text=edit tag=td>
<!---->
<$list filter="[<tempTableSort>getindex[sortIndex]match<currentColumn>]"emptyMessage=<<editCell>>variable=ignore>
 <<showCell_Locked>>
</$list>

\define showCell()
<$let fmt=[UTC]YYYY.0MM.0DD>
<$set tiddler=<<currentRecord>>field=<<currentColumn>>name=due-date>
<$text text={{{[<due-date>split[-]split[.]join[]format:date<fmt>]}}}/>
</$set>

\end
\define showCell_Locked()<span style=font-style:oblique;><<showCell>>
\define edit_date()
<$list filter='[[$:/plugins/kookma/pikaday]!is[missing]]:filter[lookup:no[$:/config/Plugins/Disabled/]match[no]]'emptyMessage='<$edit-text tag=input tiddler=<<currentRecord>>field=<<currentColumn>>type=date/>'variable=null>
  <<editCell>>

\end
<$reveal type=nomatch stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>>stateIndex=mode text=edit tag=td class=shiraz-dtable-col-fixedsize>
<<showCell>>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type=match stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>>stateIndex=mode text=edit tag=td>
<!---->
<$list filter='[<tempTableSort>getindex[sortIndex]match<currentColumn>]'emptyMessage=<<edit_date>>variable=ignore>
 <<showCell_Locked>>
</$list>

\define display-email-address() <$let href={{{[getaddprefix[mailto:]]}}}> >rel="noopener noreferrer"target=_blank> <> \end \define display-email-address_Locked() <$let href={{{[getaddprefix[mailto:]]}}}> >rel="noopener noreferrer"target=_blank> <> \end <$reveal type=nomatch stateTitle=<>stateIndex=mode text=edit tag=td> <> <$reveal type=match stateTitle=<>stateIndex=mode text=edit tag=td> <$list filter="[getindex[sortIndex]match]"emptyMessage=<>variable=ignore> <>

\define circle(color fill)
<svg width=12 height=12>
<circle cx=6 cy=6 r=5 stroke=<<__color__>>fill=<<__fill__>>stroke-width=1/>

\end
\define showCell()
<$list filter="[<currentRecord>get<currentColumn>match[5]]"variable=ignore>
<$macrocall $name=circle color=#dc3545 fill=#f8d7da/> very high
</$list>
<$list filter="[<currentRecord>get<currentColumn>match[4]]"variable=ignore>
<$macrocall $name=circle color=#ff8c00 fill=#fff3cd/> high
</$list>
<$list filter="[<currentRecord>get<currentColumn>match[3]]"variable=ignore>
<$macrocall $name=circle color=#17a2b8 fill=#d1ecf1/> normal
</$list>
<$list filter="[<currentRecord>get<currentColumn>match[2]]"variable=ignore>
<$macrocall $name=circle color=#007bff fill=#cce5ff/> low
</$list>
<$list filter="[<currentRecord>get<currentColumn>match[1]]"variable=ignore>
<$macrocall $name=circle color=#6c757d fill=#e2e3e5/> very low

\end
\define showCell_Locked()<span style=font-style:oblique;><<showCell>>
\define select_priority()<$select tiddler=<<currentRecord>>field=<<currentColumn>>default=''><option value=''>Select...</option><option value=5>very high</option><option value=4>high</option><option value=3>normal</option><option value=2>low</option><option value=1>very low</option><option value=''>no priority
<$reveal type=nomatch stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>>stateIndex=mode text=edit tag=td class=shiraz-dtable-priority>
<<showCell>>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type=match stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>>stateIndex=mode text=edit tag=td>
<!---->
<$list filter='[<tempTableSort>getindex[sortIndex]match<currentColumn>]'emptyMessage=<<select_priority>>variable=ignore>
 <<showCell_Locked>>
</$list>
<$reveal>

\define showCell()<$transclude tiddler=<<currentRecord>>field=<<currentColumn>>mode=inline/>
\define showCell_Locked()<span style=font-style:oblique;><<showCell>>
\define select_status()
<$select tiddler=<<currentRecord>>field=<<currentColumn>>default=''>
<option value=''>Select...</option>
<$list filter='open in-work on-hold complete rework closed'variable=status><option><$text text=<<status>>/></option></$list>

\end
<$reveal type=nomatch stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>>stateIndex=mode text=edit tag=td class=shiraz-dtable-col-fixedsize>
<<showCell>>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type=match stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>>stateIndex=mode text=edit tag=td>
<!---->
<$list filter='[<tempTableSort>getindex[sortIndex]match<currentColumn>]'emptyMessage=<<select_status>>variable=ignore>
 <<showCell_Locked>>
</$list>

<$reveal type=nomatch stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>>stateIndex=mode text=edit tag=td>
<$list filter="[<currentRecord>tags[]]:except[subfilter<sv-exclude-tags>]">
{{||$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/body/tag-helper}}
</$list>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type=match stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>>stateIndex=mode text=edit tag=td>
<!---->
<$list filter="[<tempTableSort>getindex[sortIndex]match<currentColumn>]"emptyMessage=<<editCell>>variable=ignore>
 <<showCell_Locked>>
</$list>

<$reveal type=nomatch state=<<tempPathExpand>>text=show tag=td>
  <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink">
    <$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tempTableExpand>>$index=<<currentRecord>>$value=show/>
    {{$:/core/images/right-arrow}}
  </$button>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type=match state=<<tempPathExpand>>text=show tag=td>
  <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink">
    <$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tempTableExpand>>$index=<<currentRecord>>/>
    {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}}
  </$button>

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/foote.text:
<$let idx={{{[<currentColumn>addsuffix[/]addsuffix<footerRow>]}}}getFieldOrIndex={{{[<fieldOrIndex>]-index +[then[get]else[getindex]]}}}>
<!---->
<$reveal type=nomatch stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>>stateIndex=mode text=edit tag=td>
<$transclude tiddler=<<tempTableFooter>>index=<<idx>>mode=inline/>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type=match stateTitle=<<tempTableEdit>>stateIndex=mode text=edit tag=td>
<$edit-text tiddler=<<tempTableFooter>>index=<<idx>>tag=input class=shiraz-dtable-textbox/>
</$reveal>

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/templates/heade.text: <$reveal type=nomatch stateTitle=<>stateIndex=sortIndex text=<>tag=th> <$button setTitle=<>setTo=<>class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"setIndex=sortIndex> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<>$index=hasnegate $value=false/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<>$value=""$index=negate/> <$text text=<>/> <$reveal type=match stateTitle=<>stateIndex=sortIndex text=<>tag=th> <$list filter="[getindex[hasnegate]match[false]]"variable=ignore> <$button setTitle=<>setIndex=hasnegate class="tbl-sort-svg tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"setTo> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<>$index=negate $value=!/> <$text text=<>/> {{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$list filter="[getindex[hasnegate]match[true]]"variable=ignore> <$button setTitle=<>setIndex=hasnegate class="tbl-sort-svg tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink"setTo=false> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<>$value=""$index=negate/> <$text text=<>/> {{$:/core/images/up-arrow}}

\define rowStyle()color:<<colour foreground>>; background-color:<<colour table-header-background>>;
\define chk-checkactions()
<$list filter="[subfilter<inputFilter>]"variable=currentRecord>
<$action-listops $tiddler=<<currentRecord>>$tags=+[append[Done]]/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<currentRecord>>status=complete/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tempTableStyle>>$index=<<currentRecord>>$value=<<rowStyle>>/>

\end
\define chk-uncheckactions()
<$list filter="[subfilter<inputFilter>]"variable=currentRecord>
<$action-listops $tiddler=<<currentRecord>>$tags=+[remove[Done]]/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<currentRecord>>status=rework/>
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<tempTableStyle>>$index=<<currentRecord>>/>

\end
<th class=shiraz-dtable-svg>
<$checkbox checkactions=<<chk-checkactions>>uncheckactions=<<chk-uncheckactions>>/>

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/ControlPanel.caption: Shiraz
$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/ControlPanel.text:
\define dynamictables-editortype()$:/config/shiraz/dynamictables/editor-type
These settings let you customise the behaviour of Shiraz plugin.

---

;Show Shiraz setting in more sidebar
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/ControlPanel/Settings" tag="$:/tags/MoreSideBar"> Show setting in more sidebar</$checkbox>

;Options
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/multicols/storyriver" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Multicolumn story river</$checkbox>
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/ui/colorify-buttons" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Colorful UI buttons</$checkbox>
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/ui/view-toolbar-button-visibility" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Hide tiddler's view toolbar and show on mouse hover</$checkbox>
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/ui/edit-toolbar-buttons" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Traffic lights for edit toolbar buttons</$checkbox>
:<$checkbox tiddler="$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/styles/colorful-sidebar-tab" tag="$:/tags/Stylesheet"> Colorify sidebar tabs</$checkbox>

;Set dark and light palettes
{{$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/set-dark-light-palette}}
; Choose Local Editor for Dynamic Table
:<$checkbox tiddler=<<dynamictables-editortype>> field="text" checked="main-editor" unchecked="simple-textarea" default="simple-textarea"> Use Tiddlywiki main editor </$checkbox>
:<$checkbox tiddler=<<dynamictables-editortype>> field="text" checked="simple-textarea" unchecked="main-editor" default="simple-textarea"> Use simple text area </$checkbox>

$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/set-dark-lig.text:
\define switchpaletteTid()$:/plugins/kookma/shiraz/ui/Buttons/SwitchPalette \define selectPelette(title default tiddler field) <$select tiddler=<<__tiddler__>>field=<<__field__>>default=''> <$list filter='[[$:/tags/Palette]tagging[]]'> \end
<$macrocall $name=selectPelette title='Dark palette'filter=<>default='$:/palettes/SolarizedDark'tiddler=<>field=dark-palette/>
<$macrocall $name=selectPelette title='Light palette'filter=<>default='$:/palettes/Vanilla'tiddler=<>field=light-palette/> <$button> {{$:/core/images/erase}} <$action-setfield $tiddler=<>$value={{!!dark-palette}}$field=dark-palette/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<>$value={{!!light-palette}}$field=light-palette/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/palette'$value={{!!light-palette}}$field=text/>
